name: The Way Remastered
overview: The Way is a 2D Puzzle platformer game inspired by classic titles like Another World, Heart of Darkness and Flashback made by Puzzling Dream and published by PlayWay. It tells a story about a member of space explorers team, who lost his beloved one and cannot accept her death. Finding ancient writings on eternal existence during one of his last expeditions makes him come back there in search of the meaning of life itself.
